oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An Efficient Copper-Catalyzed Three-Component Synthesis of 3-C-Linked Glycosyl Iminocoumarins
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PALANICHAMY, K
SURAVARAPU, SR
KALIAPPAN, KP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: multicomponent reactions
copper

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An efficient general strategy was developed for the synthesis of previously unknown 3-C-linked glycosyl iminocoumarins. The strategy involves a copper-catalyzed multicomponent reaction of sugar-derived alkynes with tosyl azide and salicylaldehyde to give a diverse array of glycosyl iminocoumarins in good yields. These compounds can serve as appropriate precursors for the synthesis of the corresponding coumarin 3-C-glycosides.
